header.memalloc: 4 byte Memory allocation size for runtime
header.shoff: 4 byte Section header table file offset
header.shnum: 4 byte Section header table entry count
header.shstrndx: 4 byte Section heade string table index

section_header.name: 4 byte Section name (string tbl index)
section_header.addr: 4 byte Section virtual addr at execution
section_header.entsize: 4 byte Entry size if section holds table
